data.title: Antique bar in renovated older building
data.text: Service is always good here,staff knows menu items.I've been here several times,food a little pricey.I've had their corned beef entree and fish with chips which ended up being potato chips.The things we go there for is the scallop or bacon wrapped shrimp appetizer.This time we also had the wings and potato skins.They were ok but shrimp and scallop app still the best.If you like the noise go before 8 p.m.We have gone at nine and sat outside once and at a side table and much more quiet and romantic.

data.title: Nice atmosphere
data.text: I've eaten here twice and I'm not very impressed with the food or menu, but the atmosphere is nice outside on the patio. My guy likes their fish plate, but I've yet to find a dish I enjoy.

data.title: Date Night
data.text: One of our first date nights. I have been to this establishment before but never for dinner. Fiance and I had a wonderful time. We were actually here during early Fall of 2015. Great service and food. Ate outdoors, weather was perfect, all in all a great night.

data.title: Gross Gross Gross
data.text: Bad food. Greasy food. Bland food. But at least it was expensive. The bathroom was deplorable. The entire place smells like beer ..

data.title: Hit Happy Hour!
data.text: Wife and I dropped in for supper and arrived before 6 pm so we got to take advantage of the $3 appetizers and $4 glasses of house wine. The wine (cabernet) was ok; it was decent. My wife had the trout special and it was very good. I had the beef medallions and they were really good; nice and tender. Great dining experience with good service.

data.title: Best place to eat and drink in O'Fallon, MO area!
data.text: Great food and excellent drink assortment. Irish/English pub ambiance with seating for family events, couples, 3 bars, or any dining needs.

data.title: Good wholesome food
data.text: Food and service well above average and outside dining is great and comfortable.  Highly recommended.

data.title: Special!
data.text: Dropped in for supper and as usual the patio was pretty full so we ate inside. I ordered the soup of the day as a starter, which was a creamy chicken and rice. The soup had large chunks of chicken and was very tasty. My wife had a salad that was fresh. For a main course, I had the parmeson encrusted sirloin marsala that was excellent. The steak was cooked perfectly, tender, tasty and huge. The potatoes were good as well. My wife    had a turkey melt sandwich that was OK; the best part of her meal was the pub chips. Wine prices are very reasonable but the selection is limited. Good service and friendly staff. A good meal all round for a reasonable price. Worth the visit.

data.title: Great Neighborhood Restaurant
data.text:
Mc Gurks is on of my husband and my favorites!  They have a great selection of appetizers, sandwiches and entrees. My favorites are their Reuben Sandwich and the potato crusted Salmon. Service is great and they have a good selection of beer and wine. 
In nice weather they have a terrific patio area. 
Definitely worth trying!

data.title: Always a winner
data.text: Except for a few sloppy drunks at the bar. This place is great. The workers are all well trained in service. The food. - we haven't found anything on the menu yet that isn't great. The prices are well within line with other places

owner_response.author: Cass K, Public Relations Manager at Mc Gurks Public House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for the kind words!  We appreciate your support and we hope that you'll continue to visit us.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Second time around... Meh
data.text: Last visit was 2014, which was better than this visit. First off, our server was extremely nice, but we felt a little neglected. The food.. Not bad, just not great. The wife had the stew and there was absolutely no sauce (like to dip a biscuit) in it and she felt like it was old. I had the pork chop, which was okay. Not a fan of the raisins covering the chop, and the side that came with it. We probably won't be back for another two years.

owner_response.author: Cass K, Public Relations Manager at Mc Gurks Public House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the feedback.  We're disappointed that you weren't totally satisfied, but we appreciate you visiting us and we hope that you'll give us another chance to impress you.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great service
data.text: Every time we come here the food is excellent but the service is outstanding!! Every single person in there is great! We come to this as much as we can

owner_response.author: Cass K, Public Relations Manager at Mc Gurks Public House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you Karrie!  We try our best to offer great food and service and we're glad that you appreciate it.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Love this place!
data.text: This is a great Irish pub complete with shepherds pie and Irish stew, but you can also have an excellent steak, grilled salmon or a light salad. If you love craft beers - they have an extensive selection and a knowledgeable staff. Their outside patio area is charming and perfect for date night.

owner_response.author: Cass K, Public Relations Manager at Mc Gurks Public House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for reviewing us Stephanie!  We're glad you think the patio makes for a perfect date night!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice Enough but Lacking Anything Special
data.text: This place gets 3 points as our experience was average - not bad, no complaints really, just nothing to get excited about.  My feeling is those who write raving reviews of the place haven't traveled much.  The beer selection was limited, the food was tasty but nothing special, and the service was pedestrian.  The music was played a little too loud, and the outdoor seating was nice but lacked any real décor.

owner_response.author: Cass K, Public Relations Manager at Mc Gurks Public House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for the feedback.  We're glad that you don't have any complaints and we hope that you'll give us another chance in the future to leave you totally impressed!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fantastic!
data.text:
This place is fantastic! The food is oh so good! My husband ordered fish and chips and loved it. My kids ordered Mac n Cheese and a hamburger. Both were delicious!
Onion rings and chicken wings were a hit too!
We only had to wait to be seated 15 minutes on a Friday night. It's a big restaurant with a lot of outdoor seating too. 
I highly recommend.

owner_response.author: Cass K, Public Relations Manager at Mc Gurks Public House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks Debbie!  We appreciate the kind words and hope that you'll continue to visit us!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Irish Pub
data.text: We love Mc Gurks!  Great burgers.  My husband loves their Shepherds Pie as well.  Good beer selection.  Weather permitting, we always try to get seated on their patio.  Probably, the beat outdoor dining area in St Charles County.

owner_response.author: Cass K, Public Relations Manager at Mc Gurks Public House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for the review!  We're glad to hear you and your husband love the food and patio!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Awesome place
data.text: Love both of the locations but my last visit to the Ofallon location was the best yet. The food was great and so was the selection of beers.  The patio is amazing.

owner_response.author: Cass K, Public Relations Manager at Mc Gurks Public House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks Scott!  We try to make sure the food, beer, and patio are always awesome!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Best restaurant in O'Fallon MO!
data.text: Wonderful Atmosphere inside & out. Most beautiful garden patio setting I've seen anywhere with large pond complete with koi & waterfall. Inside it's an Irish pub. Dinner is gourmet fare but they also offer sandwiches, salads & delicious vegetarian choices as well.

owner_response.author: Cass K, Public Relations Manager at Mc Gurks Public House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We appreciate you saying that about our patio!  Thanks for visiting and we hope that you'll stop by again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good choice
data.text: Great outdoor patio bar. House salad is excellent. Fish and chips is good. Not the best you've ever had but a solid good, I'd order again. Staff was cheerful and helpful. Quality pub in the area, I can see why ranked high.

owner_response.author: Cass K, Public Relations Manager at Mc Gurks Public House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for the review!  We're glad you enjoyed everything and hope that you'll continue to visit us!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Wedding gathering
data.text: We went there after a couple of our friends got married (middle-aged...VERY small wedding).  It was nice and they were very gracious to the newly weds.

owner_response.author: Cass K, Public Relations Manager at Mc Gurks Public House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for stopping by and congrats again to the newlyweds!
owner_response.title: Owner Response
